column5: Check out this weeks DTV! Amazing it's a gulp bait that moves by its self!!!! I posted it on you tube so you guys could share it on face book, twitter, my space or where ever you want it is that awesome.  http://www.youtube.com/user/factsoffishing
HAHAHAHAH great Dave, AMAZING is right.
Nice.  I need to get one of those baits.
you had me at it moves under warm water then you lost me at happy halloween you suck lol
HA I like that!  well played!
Dave that was not BPS where were you I want to get over there and get some of them for sure. Thanks for the heads up Cheers
Nice....saw this one on there as well http://www.youtube.com/user/factsoffishing#p/u/3/NiCsM39Q288  So funny!
looks like an interesting bait, hope it works well!  Cheers!
awesome video dave! I want to be the first to own one of those baits Hope everyone has a fun and safe Halloween!
you lost me at drop shotting on lake erie
Lmao, thats amazing Dave. You made my little brother jump   Thanks for that, MTBF
lol u had me going! the funny thing is i think i actually saw it ripple must be psychological!
I was shocked you kept from LOL while doing that spoof...  good one...
O.K. here it is right below the kick tail minnow and the led bite lite lure. walking worm  Don't forget to order extra for your buddies......   Art
Ummm Art.  Did you watch Dave's full video?  his was a joke if you didn't, cheers.  I think it would have been better if he used a real worm
Nope I saw it all. it's just funny that the infomercial Dave posted actually was a true one here in the states.      Art
